title: Maintenance Organisation Approvals
description: Requirements for the approval of maintenance organizations
content: This regulation establishes the requirements to be met by an organisation to qualify for the issue or continuation of an approval for the maintenance of aircraft and components.

title: Continuing Airworthiness Requirements
description: Requirements for ensuring the continuing airworthiness of aircraft
content: This regulation establishes the common technical requirements and administrative procedures for ensuring the continuing airworthiness of aircraft, including any component for installation thereto.

title: Certifying Staff
content: This regulation establishes the requirements for the issue of an aircraft maintenance licence and conditions of its validity and use, for aeroplanes and helicopters.

title: Certification Specifications for Large Aeroplanes
content: This document contains the certification specifications for large aeroplanes, including airworthiness codes and acceptable means of compliance.

title: Pressurized cabins
description: Requirements for pressurized cabins in large aeroplanes
content: Pressurized cabins and compartments to be occupied must be equipped to provide a cabin pressure altitude of not more than 2438 m (8000 ft) at the maximum operating altitude of the aeroplane under normal operating conditions.

title: Occurrence Reporting
description: Acceptable means of compliance for occurrence reporting
content: This AMC provides acceptable means of compliance for occurrence reporting according to Regulation (EU) No 376/2014.

title: Fuel Contamination
description: Safety information bulletin on fuel contamination
content: This Safety Information Bulletin provides recommendations regarding fuel contamination detection and prevention.

title: Certification of Aircraft and Related Products, Parts and Appliances
description: Requirements for the certification of aircraft and related products
content: This regulation establishes the requirements and procedures for the certification of aircraft and related products, parts and appliances, and of design and production organisations.
